objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><radialGradient id='bgGradient' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='70%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#7B1FA2'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#4A148C'/></radialGradient><radialGradient id='goldGradient' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='70%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFC107'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#FF8F00'/></radialGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGradient)'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='white' stroke='#FFC107' stroke-width='5'/><circle cx='850' cy='400' r='120' fill='url(#goldGradient)' stroke='#FFD700' stroke-width='3'/><g opacity='0.2'><circle cx='100' cy='200' r='20' fill='#FFD700'/><circle cx='980' cy='300' r='15' fill='#FFD700'/><circle cx='200' cy='900' r='25' fill='#FFD700'/><circle cx='850' cy='800' r='18' fill='#FFD700'/></g><g opacity='0.3'><path d='M200 350 Q300 300 400 350' stroke='#FFD700' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><path d='M680 800 Q780 750 880 800' stroke='#FFD700' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><path d='M150 600 Q200 550 250 600' stroke='#FFD700' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><path d='M800 200 Q850 150 900 200' stroke='#FFD700' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/></g><g opacity='0.15'><circle cx='540' cy='100' r='50' fill='#FFD700'/><circle cx='100' cy='540' r='50' fill='#FFD700'/><circle cx='980' cy='540' r='50' fill='#FFD700'/><circle cx='540' cy='980' r='50' fill='#FFD700'/></g></svg>

objects.text: • Premium Gold-Plated • Pearl Embellished • Elegant Design

product_details.name: Luxe Pearl Wave Gold-Plated Hoop Earrings | Elegant Statement Piece
product_details.description:
• Premium gold-plated finish for lasting shine and luxury
• Double row of delicate pearl embellishments
• Sophisticated curved wave design for modern elegance
• Secure post back closure for comfortable wear
• Perfect blend of classic pearls and contemporary styling
• Ideal for both formal occasions and everyday glamour
• Lightweight and comfortable all-day wear
• Unique architectural design with reflective surfaces
• Versatile size that frames the ear beautifully
• Hypoallergenic material suitable for sensitive ears

banner_details:
The banner showcases a luxurious and elegant design tailored for a jewelry promotion. The layout centers around a highlighted product image ("product_image") placed inside a circular white frame with a golden border. The backdrop features a rich deep purple radial gradient, enhanced with dynamic gold-colored circular and line accents to add depth.

The top features a bold headline ("heading") in a regal gold color, followed by a subheading ("subheading") in white serif typography, introducing the product category. To the right of the product is a golden circular badge containing the price ("price") in a tech-inspired font. 

Beneath, a feature bullet line ("description") in white text outlines product highlights. At the bottom, a yellow rectangular button ("cta_background") features a dark purple "SHOP NOW" call-to-action text ("cta").

**Color Palette:**
- Background Gradient: #7B1FA2 (violet), #4A148C (deep purple)
- Gold Accents: #FFC107 (amber), #FF8F00 (orange gold), #FFD700 (golden yellow)
- Button Text & Price Font: #4A148C (deep purple)
- Text Colors: Gold (#FFD700) for the heading, White (#FFFFFF) for subheading and features
product_color: The product image features bold and elegant gold earrings adorned with a line of lustrous white pearls. The dominant color is a rich metallic gold (#D4AF37), which reflects light with warm highlights (#FFD700) and darker golden shadows (#B8860B), creating a realistic 3D sheen. The pearls are a soft, pristine white (#F8F8FF), reflecting subtle silver-gray undertones (#DCDCDC), enhancing their natural luster. These colors blend smoothly, with the gold providing a luxurious backdrop while the pearls stand out delicately. For a cohesive advertisement banner, a palette of gold, pearl white, warm gray, and subtle beige tones can be used to echo the elegance.
